SELECT articleno, thumbnail, sports_nm, title, reg_id, reg_dt, hyperlink, views FROM article
sports_nm = #{sports_nm}

SELECT season, lname, location, tname, logo FROM team
lname = #{lname}

SELECT videono, sports_nm, title, reg_id, reg_dt, hyperlink, views FROM video
sports_nm = #{sports_nm}
SELECT name, avg, played, hits, safety, b2, b3, hr, rbi, score, steal, ball4, k, obp, slg, ops, isop, babip, woba, wrc, wpa, war FROM taja_info WHERE lname = 'KBO' ORDER BY AVG desc
SELECT tusuid, name, eravg, played, inning, win, lose, save, hold, k, ob, ohr, r, ball4, bb, wper, whip, k9, bb9, kbb, kper, bbper, wpa, war FROM tusu_info ORDER by eravg asc
SELECT baseno, season, lname, TO_CHAR(time,'yyyy-mm-dd HH24MISS') as time, location, hname, hscore, ateam, ascore, mlink, vlink FROM baseball_match
SELECT basketid, lname, name, profile, played, score, assists, rebound, steal, blocking, point2, point3, ftr, success_yato, success_3p, success_ftr FROM basketball_info
SELECT basketno, season, lname, time, location, hname, hscore, ateam, ascore, mlink, vlink FROM basketball_match
SELECT golfid, lname, name, profile, nation, ernings, point, savg, ddavg, appgrn, pavg, fhit, top10f FROM golf_rank
SELECT golfno, lname, cname, sdate, edate, winner, score FROM golf_match
SELECT volleyid, name, profile, score, attack_sr, sub, blocking, defense, sets, recieve_ef FROM volleyball_info
SELECT volleyno, season, lname, time, location, hname, hscore, ateam, ascore, mlink, vlink FROM volleyball_match

SELECT footid , lname , name , profile , score , assists , points , played , plravg , mvp , best11 , shots , shotsont , gpers , gperg , cfouls , dfouls , yellow , red , corners , pkick , offsides , ptime FROM football_info

SELECT footno , season , lname , TO_CHAR(time, 'HH24:MI') AS time , location , hname , hscore , ateam , ascore , mlink , vlink FROM football_match
lname = #{lname}

SELECT B1.hname AS hname, T1.LOGO AS logo, COUNT(B1.hscore) AS hscore, COUNT(CASE WHEN B1.hscore > B1.ascore THEN NULL ELSE 1 END) AS win, COUNT(CASE WHEN B1.hscore < B1.ascore THEN NULL ELSE 1 END) AS lose, COUNT(CASE WHEN B1.hscore = B1.ascore THEN 1 ELSE NULL END) AS draw, ROUND(COUNT(CASE WHEN B1.hscore > B1.ascore THEN NULL ELSE 1 END) / COUNT(B1.hscore), 2) AS winrate FROM baseball_match B1 JOIN team T1 ON T1.tname = B1.hname GROUP BY B1.hname, T1.logo ORDER BY winrate desc
